description: Polyfill implementation for MutationObserver and WeakMap, providing support for these features in environments lacking native support.

classes.name: JsMutationObserver
classes.description: A polyfill class for MutationObserver, providing DOM mutation observation capabilities.

classes.name: MutationRecord
classes.description: Represents information about a DOM mutation.

classes.name: Registration
classes.description: Handles registration of mutation observers for DOM nodes.

methods.name: observe
methods.description: Starts observing a DOM node for specified mutations.

methods.name: takeRecords
methods.description: Returns a list of mutation records that have occurred.

methods.name: set
methods.description: Sets a key-value pair in WeakMap.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a value from WeakMap by key.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a key-value pair from WeakMap.

methods.name: has
methods.description: Checks if a key exists in WeakMap.
